short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transfers a shipping address from an Etsy receipt to Paypal's USPS shipping form.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a button to an Etsy receipt labelled "Create USPS/PayPal Label". When clicked, this button opens the USPS shipping label form on PayPal, and transfers the Etsy receipt address to that form.
